mapper.sql: id, name, doc_code, type, action, lang, content, sha, description, is_latest, create_date, create_by, update_date, update_by, del_flag
fc.id, fc.name, fc.doc_code, fc.type, fc.action, fc.lang, fc.content, fc.sha, fc.description, fc.is_latest, fc.create_date, fc.create_by, fc.update_date, fc.update_by, fc.del_flag
mapper.select:
select
,(select user_name from sys_user where id=fc.create_by) create_by_str from doc_file_changes fc where fc.del_flag!=1 and fc.doc_code = #{docCode,jdbcType=INTEGER} order by fc.update_date desc

select
from doc_file_changes where del_flag!=1 and is_latest=1 and doc_code = #{docCode,jdbcType=INTEGER} limit 1

select
from doc_file_changes fc where fc.del_flag!=1 and fc.is_latest=1
AND fc.name LIKE CONCAT('%','${name}','%')
AND fc.lang = #{lang,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND EXISTS (select 1 from doc_file_label fl where fc.id=fl.file_id and fl.label_id=#{labelId,jdbcType=BIGINT})
order by fc.update_date desc
mapper.insert: insert into doc_file_changes (id, name, doc_code, type, action, lang, content, sha, description, is_latest, create_date, create_by, update_date, update_by, del_flag ) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{docCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{action,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lang,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sha,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isLatest,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{delFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER} )

insert into doc_file_changes
id,
name,
doc_code,
type,
action,
lang,
content,
sha,
description,
is_latest,
create_date,
create_by,
update_date,
update_by,
del_flag,

mapper.update:
update doc_file_changes
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
doc_code = #{docCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
action = #{action,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
lang = #{lang,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
content = #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sha = #{sha,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
is_latest = #{isLatest,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
del_flag = #{delFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update doc_file_changes set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, doc_code = #{docCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, action = #{action,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, lang = #{lang,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, content = #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sha = #{sha,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_latest = #{isLatest,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, del_flag = #{delFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
update doc_file_changes set is_latest = 0 where doc_code = #{docCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
